answers.answer: Hi,Yes, what you are experiencing is mostly the symptom of a basic health problem - it could be diabetes, blood pressure, circulatory problem or simply a deficiency of nutrients in food and/or lack of exercise.You need to consult a physician and do an overall health check up done. You should also try to reduce your weight.Good luck,Solace

question: I'm a 35 year old male thats only been married for approximatley 4 years to a beautiful gorgeouse woman.  Ive noticed for the last year or so ive been having difficluties keeping an errection during sex.  My wife has not given me a hard.  Last night was the last draw for me.  We started to forplay and i could not get an errection for the life of me.  about 20-25 minutes later i gave up.  i dont know what to do.  Other than going to the Dr. office what else can i do.  Im 5'8.5 and about 245 lbs, diabetes runs in my family as well.
title: errection
